properties.entry: select password from SEC_USER where Login_Id = #loginId#
SELECT ur.Role_ID AS Id, sr.Name FROM SEC_User_Role ur INNER JOIN SEC_Role sr ON ur.Role_ID = sr.Id WHERE (ur.User_ID = #userId#)

SELECT sp.code as Operation,sp.Name,sp.Url,pr.Rule,pr.Behaviour,pr.Priority,sp.Element_Id FROM SEC_Role_Permission rp INNER JOIN SEC_Permission sp ON rp.operation_id = sp.id LEFT JOIN SEC_Permission_Rule pr ON rp.Rule_Id = pr.id WHERE rp.Role_ID in ($userRoles$) order by pr.Priority asc
SELECT CODE AS Operation,NAME,CASE WHEN (TYPE = 'Page' OR TYPE = 'Module') THEN Url ELSE '' END AS URL FROM SEC_Permission WHERE Url LIKE '/%'
